thread.title: BREAKING: $49+ JetBlue Airfare Sale, 2 Days Only!
thread.title_full: BREAKING: $49+ JetBlue Airfare Sale, 2 Days Only!

title: BREAKING: $49+ JetBlue Airfare Sale, 2 Days Only!
text:
BREAKING: $49+ JetBlue Airfare Sale, 2 Days Only! BREAKING: $49+ JetBlue Airfare Sale, 2 Days Only! August 25, 2015 9:15am   
JetBlue's new two-day sale discounts fall flights to dozens of domestic, Caribbean, and Latin American destinations. Fares start at $49 one-way ($98 round-trip). Tickets must be booked by 11:59 p.m. ET on August 26, and are valid for travel any day except Fridays and Sundays during September 8 - December 16. Blackout dates are October 12 and November 20 - 30. Additionally, NYC-area airport travel is prohibited from November 4 - 9.   these sales
